front.sentence: A man sees the way to fuck you over. Fair play. It's human nature. And there's no mercy

back.phonetic: ə mæn siz ðə weɪ tɪ fək ju ˈoʊvər fɛr pleɪ ɪt ɛs ˈjumən ˈneɪʧər ənd ðɛr ɛs noʊ ˈmərsi

sentence: A man sees the way to fuck you over. Fair play. It's human nature. And there's no mercy
